author: globo.com
title: Vivi Wanderley anuncia término de namoro com Juliano Floss: 'Só sentimento não sustenta relação' | TV & Famosos | gshow
text:
1 de 2 Vivi Wanderley e Juliano Floss — Foto: Agnews Vivi Wanderley e Juliano Floss — Foto: Agnews
O relacionamento entre Vivi Wanderley e Juliano Floss chegou ao fim depois de dois anos. Em uma rede social, a influenciadora digital anunciou o término do relacionamento com o rapaz.
✅ Clique aqui e participe do canal do gshow no WhatsApp
Na publicação, a influenciadora digital decidiu anunciar em respeito aos fãs do agora ex-casal. "Em respeito a todos os fãs do nosso relacionamento, venho dizer que eu e Ju não estamos mais juntos", escreveu ela, que publicou uma foto ao lado de Juliano em uma praia.
"A gente fez de tudo para fazer funcionar porque nosso amor um pelo outro é muito forte, mas só sentimento não sustenta uma relação. Só desejo coisas boas para ele. Dois anos não são dois meses", disse ela.
A influenciadora digital pediu compreensão e respeito neste momento, porque, de acordo com ela, "esse momento é barra para os dois".
Briga no namoro
2 de 2 Juliano Floss e Vivi Wanderley combinavam roupas — Foto: Reprodução/Instagram Juliano Floss e Vivi Wanderley combinavam roupas — Foto: Reprodução/Instagram
Em outubro, Vivi e Juliano desmentiram rumores de término, mas tinham confirmado uma "briga feia" no namoro.
"Tivemos uma briga muito feia mesmo, pensamos realmente em terminar. Quando estava indo até a casa do Juliano para decidirmos nossa vida, começou a sair em tudo quanto é Instagram de fofoca", detalhou a influenciadora.
"Entendo que os canais de notícia vão passar a informação. Triste a pessoa que falou para eles, estávamos numa fase ruim, não precisávamos disso e acabou que isso nos deixou mais fortes", disse ele, trocando beijos com a namorada, antes de mostrarem-se chocados com o assédio que teria surgido quando a história do rompimento começou a ganhar força.

author: Max Schäfer
title: Bilanz zur Rente: Experte warnt vor heikler Geldbeutel-Wende
text:
Bilanz zur Rente: Experte warnt vor heikler Geldbeutel-Wende
Die Rente entwickelt sich positiv, doch garantiert sind die Steigerungen nicht. Wie oft gab es in den vergangenen Jahren Nullrunden?
Berlin – Trotz enormer Probleme bei der Finanzierung der gesetzlichen Rente kommt zum 1. Juli die nächste Erhöhung: Die Bezüge von Millionen Rentnern steigen um 3,74 Prozent. Für einen Rentenpunkt gibt es dann 40,79 Euro pro Monat – statt bisher 39,32 Euro. Grund für das Wachstum sind gesetzliche Regelungen. Die Vergangenheit zeigt jedoch: Eine Rentenerhöhung ist nicht garantiert, Nullrunden sind möglich.
Rentenerhöhung nicht garantiert – Nullrunden drohen
Die Erhöhungen – oder Nullrunden – hängen von gewissen Regeln ab: Die Renten sind bisher an die Lohnentwicklung im Vorjahr gekoppelt. 2024 sind die Bruttolöhne aller Beschäftigten laut Statistischen Bundesamt um 5,4 Prozent gestiegen. Beamte und Selbstständige, die keine Beiträge in die gesetzliche Rente einzahlen, fallen noch raus. Dann bleibt laut Bundesregierung ein Wachstum von 3,69 Prozent bei den Versicherten.
Die Rente steigt jedoch stärker als diese 3,69 Prozent, weil zudem die sogenannte untere Haltelinie greift. Das sogenannte Rentenniveau garantiert derzeit, dass eine Standardrente nach 45 Beitragsjahren bei einem Durchschnittsverdienst nicht unter 48 Prozent davon fällt. Ergebnis ist das Plus von 3,74 Prozent.
Renten sind in 35 fast immer gestiegen
Insgesamt steigen die Altersbezüge deutlich. Nach 35 Jahren hat sich die Rente verdoppelt. Dabei zeigte sich eine kontinuierliche Entwicklung nach oben. Die größte Rentenerhöhung von 5,36 Prozent hat es erst 2022 gegeben. Auch die folgenden Jahre 2023 (4,36 Prozent) und 2024 (4,57 Prozent) waren deutlich über der Norm. Ähnlich stark war das Plus lediglich 1993 – mit 4,36 Prozent. Die Inflation war in diesen Jahren immerhin moderat. Sie bewegte sich zwischen einem (2003) und 1,6 Prozent.
Nur fünfmal gab es Nullrunden bei der Rente
Nullrunden bei der Rente gab es im Zeitraum von 1991 bis 2025 lediglich in fünf Jahren. Von 2004 bis 2006 mussten Rentner mit 26,13 Euro pro Rentenpunkt auskommen. Hintergrund war die relative Stagnation bei den Löhnen und Gehältern. Von 2003 auf 2004 waren diese lediglich um 0,42 Prozent gestiegen. 2005 um 0,49 Prozent, 2006 um ein Prozent. Erst 2007 hat es wieder eine Rentenerhöhung gegeben, jedoch lediglich um 14 Cent pro Rentenpunkt – oder 0,54 Prozent.
Jahr | Rentenwert (in Euro) | Rentenerhöhung im Vgl. zum Vorjahr | Durchschnittsentgelt (in Euro) |
---|---|---|---|
1991 | 21,19 | – | 22.712 |
1992 | 21,80 | 2,88 % | 23.939 |
1993 | 22,75 | 4,36 % | 24.633 |
1994 | 23,52 | 3,38 % | 25.126 |
1995 | 23,64 | 0,51 % | 25.905 |
1996 | 23,86 | 0,93 % | 26.423 |
1997 | 24,26 | 1,68 % | 26.660 |
1998 | 24,36 | 0,41 % | 27.060 |
1999 | 24,69 | 1,35 % | 27.358 |
2000 | 24,84 | 0,61 % | 27.741 |
2001 | 25,31 | 1,89 % | 28.231 |
2002 | 25,86 | 2,17 % | 28.626 |
2003 | 26,13 | 1,04 % | 28.938 |
2004 | 26,13 | keine | 29.060 |
2005 | 26,13 | keine | 29.202 |
2006 | 26,13 | keine | 29.494 |
2007 | 26,27 | 0,54 % | 29.951 |
2008 | 26,56 | 1,10 % | 30.625 |
2009 | 27,20 | 2,41 % | 30.506 |
2010 | 27,20 | keine | 31.144 |
2011 | 27,47 | 0,99 % | 32.100 |
2012 | 28,07 | 2,18 % | 33.002 |
2013 | 28,14 | 0,25 % | 33.659 |
2014 | 28,61 | 1,67 % | 34.514 |
2015 | 29,21 | 2,10 % | 35.363 |
2016 | 30,45 | 4,25 % | 36.187 |
2017 | 31,03 | 1,90 % | 37.077 |
2018 | 32,03 | 3,22 % | 38.212 |
2019 | 33,05 | 3,18 % | 39.301 |
2020 | 34,19 | 3,45 % | 39.167 |
2021 | 34,19 | keine | 40.463 |
2022 | 36,02 | 5,35 % | 42.053 |
2023 | 37,60 | 4,36 % | 44.732 |
2024 | 39,32 | 4,57 % | 45.358 |
2025 | 40,79 | 3,74 % | 50.493 (vorläufig) |
Ausbleibende Rentenerhöhungen fallen häufig in Krisenjahre
Dafür hat es im Krisenjahr 2009 trotz Rückgang der Gehälter um 0,39 Prozent eine recht deutliche Rentenerhöhung von 2,41 Prozent auf 27,20 Euro pro Entgeltpunkt gegeben. Dafür gab es 2010 die nächste Nullrunde, obwohl der Durchschnittslohn um 2,09 Prozent gestiegen ist. Auch hier war die Inflation mit einem Prozent recht moderat.
Die bisher letzte Renten-Nullrunde gab es im Corona-Krisenjahr 2021. Obwohl die Löhne sogar um 3,31 Prozent gestiegen sind, bliebt die Rente beim Wert von 34,19 Euro pro Punkt. In den folgenden Jahren gab es jedoch – wie beschrieben – die relativ deutlichen Erhöhungen.
Der große Renten-Ratgeber
Laden Sie sich HIER den großen Renten-Ratgeber kostenlos herunter und drucken Sie ihn unkompliziert zu Hause aus.
Experte warnt vor Geldbeutel-Wende: Sonst „wird es bald keine Rentenerhöhungen mehr geben“
Damit die Rente weiter mit der Lohnentwicklung steigt, ist jedoch politisches Handeln nötig. Denn das Rentenniveau von 48 Prozent ist nur noch in diesem Jahr garantiert. Danach könnte die Standardrente darunter liegen. Die neue Regierung aus Union und SPD will das Rentenniveau jedoch bis 2031 bei 48 Prozent halten. „Wenn dies nicht geschieht, wird es bald keine Rentenerhöhungen mehr geben“, warnte kürzlich Michaela Engelmeier, Vorstandsvorsitzende des Sozialverbands Deutschland, bei IPPEN.MEDIA.
Für Bedürftige mit Renten, die nicht das Existenzminimum sichern, sind die Nullrunden dagegen bereits Realität. Denn die sogenannte Grundsicherung im Alter und bei Erwerbsminderung orientiert sich am Bürgergeld-Regelsatz. Dabei hat es 2025 keine Erhöhung gegeben. Auch im kommenden Jahr könnte der Regelsatz bei 563 Euro für Alleinlebende bleiben – auch 2027 droht das.

author: Staff Writer
title: Mastercard and LuLu Group forge multimarket partnership to drive sustainability, innovation and efficiency in retail payments
text:
Following a decade-long partnership in the retail sector, Mastercard and LuLu Group join hands to foster sustainability, innovation, and efficiency in payments across multiple markets.
Extending across six markets, including Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, UAE and now Saudi Arabia, the partnership will see an integration of Mastercard’s expertise into Lulu Group’s operations, advancing efficiencies, scale, and data-driven decision-making. Projects that will benefit from the collaboration, include a variety of sustainability initiatives, co-branded credit card portfolios, and innovative technology enhancements.
UAE can go completely cashless by 2030, according to industry expert The partnership will introduce revamped features and benefits, such as digital in-store transactions and more cashless experiences, as well as personalised rewards and generous cashback offers on spends at LuLu stores. Being piloted for the first time, LuLu will also deploy the Mastercard Next Gen Point of Interaction (POI) solution, allowing its consumers to make cardless payments at its self-checkout counters.
“We are delighted to embark on this transformative journey with LuLu Group, a valued partner, who shares our vision for a more sustainable and inclusive future. Our partnership will enable us to enhance the Mastercard co-branded credit card experience and support LuLu in leveraging technology and innovation to boost their offerings,” said Amnah Ajmal, Executive Vice President, Market Development, EEMEA, Mastercard.
The companies will continue to offer a portfolio of co-branded credit cards via partners including Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank in the UAE, Bank Muscat in Oman, CrediMax in Bahrain, Doha Bank in Qatar, Emirates NBD in the UAE, and Gulf Bank in Kuwait. There are also plans for expanding into Saudi Arabia.
“Being able to personalise our offerings to better suit our customers’ needs, is key for Lulu Group’s growth and future ambitions. Our partnership with Mastercard enables us to do this, driving our business forward. It will also enhance the rewards and advantages we are able to offer via our co-branded credit card partner network across the region. As payments’ technology continues to offer new possibilities, we look forward to the next stage of our relationship with Mastercard,” said Saifee Rupawala, CEO, LuLu Group International.
The two organisations have spent over a decade collaborating and innovating to meet the evolving needs of consumers in the region. In 2013, a first co-branded credit card was launched, which was later followed by other initiatives that strengthened relationships with various co-brand issuer partners.

author: Reuters
title: Cacau, café e açúcar se recuperam da queda da sessão anterior Por Reuters
text:
LONDRES (Reuters) - Os contratos futuros de cacau , café e açúcar na ICE subiram nesta quinta-feira, recuperando-se da queda de quarta-feira após a eleição de Donald Trump como presidente dos Estados Unidos, com o dólar recuando dos picos pós-eleitorais.
CAFÉ
* O contrato dezembro do café arábica fechou em alta de 11,65 centavos, ou 4,7%, para 2,604 dólares por libra-peso.
* Negociantes disseram que os preços foram impulsionados pelo próximo vencimento de opções na sexta-feira, o que levou alguns investidores expostos a comprar futuros.
* As exportações de café do Brasil aumentaram 12% em outubro, para 4,65 milhões de sacas, informou o governo.
* O janeiro do café robusta subiu 4,2%, para 4.486 dólar a tonelada, depois de atingir o menor nível em dois meses e meio na quarta-feira.
AÇÚCAR
* O contrato março do açúcar bruto fechou em alta de 0,17 centavo, ou 0,8%, para 22,20 centavos de dólar por libra-peso.
* Chuvas continuam a cair sobre as áreas açucareiras do Brasil, mas é provável que o desenvolvimento da safra demore mais desta vez porque os campos estão em más condições.
* O Brasil exportou 3,73 milhões de toneladas de açúcar em outubro, segundo o governo, 30% a mais do que há um ano.
* O dezembro do açúcar branco subiu 1,3%, para 562,90 dólares por tonelada.
CACAU
* O cacau de março em Nova York fechou em alta de 508 dólares, ou 7,6%, para 7.178 dólares a tonelada, tendo perdido 4% na quarta-feira.
* O cacau de março em Londres subiu 7,1%, para 5.640 libras por tonelada, depois de cair 2,4% na quarta-feira.

author: Censor.NET
title: Russians shelled Sumy region 23 times during day. 107 explosions were recorded
text:
200
0
Russians shelled Sumy region 23 times during day. 107 explosions were recorded
 News Censor.NET War in Ukraine
On February 1, the Russian army fired 23 times at the border areas and settlements of Sumy region. 107 explosions were recorded. The Khotyn, Yunakivka, Bilopillia, Krasnopillia, and Velyka Pysarivka communities were shelled.
This was
reported by the Sumy Regional Military Administration, Censor.NET reports.
In particular, the following areas were shelled:
- Bilopillia community: the enemy fired from mortars (7 explosions) and artillery (1 explosion).
- Khotyn community: mortar attacks were carried out (11 explosions).
- Krasnopillia community: 2 UAVs (FPV drones) were fired upon, as well as mortar (13 explosions) and artillery (12 explosions) attacks.
- Velyka Pysarivka community: an explosive device was dropped from a UAV (1 explosion) and mortar (11 explosions) and artillery (12 explosions) fire was recorded.
- Yunakivka community: UAV (FPV drone) shelling (3 explosions), dropping of grenade launcher fragmentation rounds from UAV (6 explosions), artillery shelling (20 explosions) and grenade launcher (7 explosions).
Log in to Censor.NET

author: Taylor Lucas
title: This picture-perfect Ontario town with a huge waterfall captures the beauty of fall
text:
While the Muskokas are busy and thriving in the summer, fall is when the true beauty shines! Bracebridge is one of cottage country’s cutest towns, a picture-perfect area with a massive waterfall to explore and plenty of fall colours to take in.
Getting there The drive from Toronto to Bracebridge is about two hours on the dot.
The town is in the heart of the Muskoka area 15 minutes north of Gravenhurst.
Things to see & do in Bracebridge, Ontario The waterfalls in Bracebridge are a must-see especially this time of year.
The most popular is Bracebridge Falls. These falls have a silver bridge and the downtown strip as the backdrop – a stunning place to stop while you’re strolling the downtown strip.
View this post on Instagram
A post shared by Bracebridge Tourism (@visitthebridge)
Next up is High Falls. High Falls is made up of five waterfalls and the site is a perfect place to explore as it’s part of the Trans-Canada Trail. There are spots at the bottom and the top of the cascades to take in the views here.
Potts Fall is another spot you need to check out – located at the High Falls site the falls are just off the beaten path and are absolutely stunning!
Time to get your steps in at Huckleberry Rock.
“This local gem has been a beloved scenic hike for over 100 years, and is known as one of the best places to catch a sunset in Muskoka, Ontario,” shares the Muskoka Tourism page.
The 2.5km loop trail leads to a beautiful lookout point and is marked with white ribbons in trees and white marks on rocks, making it easy to navigate!
End your day exploring Bracebridge with a cold one from the Lake of Bays Bracebridge Barrelhouse.
Enjoy delicious snacks plus a selection of local brews on tap!
Bracebridge, Ontario is calling!
